data.route_analysis: Accessibility via flights to Guatemala City, local transportation options to Antigua, Lake Atitlan, and Tikal.
data.seasonal_patterns: Optimal time to visit Guatemala is from late September to early November due to mild temperatures and fewer travelers.
data.climate: The climate is typically cool and dry in autumn. Average temperatures range from 15째C (59째F) to 25째C (77째F). Light layers are recommended for the day and warmer clothes for the evening.
data.culture: Rich cultural heritage showcasing Mayan history. Autumn festivals include the Day of the Dead celebrations in early November, featuring altars and traditional foods.
